plugin.name: SqueezeDSP
plugin.title: SqueezeDSP
plugin.desc: DSP for Squeezebox server (Test version 0.1.06a) - provides EQ and DSP. Loudness fine tuning & width added
plugin.creator: Jonathan Fox

changes.change: 0.1.06a - Loudness fine tuning, Width Filter added. Some issues fixed, mainly resampling Impulse should be better.
0.1.05e - amended binary now using new simple internal DSP library, provides PEQ functions, resampler and basic convolver. Should be simpler to maintain and is faster.
0.1.04c - amended binary so that faad processes don't hang.

New Feature - Load PEQ settings from REW (Mono Only); Fixed issue with PEQ being added with odd defaults; Fixed intermittent issues resetting PEQ Bands; New Player has default Settings created on detection; Cosmetic changes; added editable outpied fields.
